data.name: Cambridge Wireless International Conference
data.location: Wellcome Genome Campus Conference Centre, Hinxton, UK
data.description: The CW International Conference (CWIC) is the flagship event for Cambridge’s world-renowned technology community. It attracts companies from across the world who want to learn from and do business with the UK’s most innovative city.
